references.description: Project schedule image for a sprint planning session totaling 24 hours. It is divided into sections: Planning (1hr 30m), Design (5hrs 40m), Development (12hrs 20m), Testing (2hrs 50m), Launch (1hr 40m), and Post-Launch activities. Each phase has specific tasks with allocated times, such as 'Define User Persona', 'Journey Mapping', 'Develop Front-end', and 'Functionality Tests'. The design features stylized headers and a mix of green and yellow color-coded time blocks against a creamy background, with a wave-like pattern at the top.
